name: codenamephp/platform.di
description: Simple dependency injection container based on www.php-di.org

scripts.phive-update: XDEBUG_MODE=off phive update && git add tools/* phive.xml && git commit -m 'Updated phive dependencies'

scripts-descriptions.phive-update: Runs a phive update and commits all tools and the phive.xml so PHPStorm won't run code formatting on the phars
scripts-descriptions.composer-require-checker: Checks for missing required composer packages
scripts-descriptions.infection: Creates mutation tests to discover missing test coverage
scripts-descriptions.ci-all: Runs all ci tools in sequence
